required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug-durg Interaction of SHR3680 With Digoxin, Rosuvastatin Calcium and Metformin Hydrochloride
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Open-lable, Fixed-sequence Phase I Drug-drug Interaction Clinical Study to Investigate the Pharmacokinetics of SHR3680 With Pgoxin (P-gp Substrates), Rosuvastatin Calcium (BCRP and OATP1B1/1B3 Substrates) and Metformin Hydrochloride (MATE1/2-K Substrates) in Prostate Cancer Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The DDI study had been designed to investigate the effect of SHR3680 on the pharmacokinetics of digoxin, Rosuvastatin calcium and metformin hydrochloride

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: To observe the effect of SHR3680 on the pharmacokinetics of digoxin, Rosuvastatin calcium, metformin hydrochloride and to evaluate the safety. The subjects will take digoxin, Rosuvastatin calcium, metformin hydrochloride at first single dose, then wash out ,and take it at second time together with SHR3680 after multiple administration of SHR3680

primary_outcome.measure: Summary of Pharmacokinetic parameters Maximum Plasma concentration (Cmax) for digoxin, Rosuvastatin calcium, metformin hydrochloride
primary_outcome.time_frame: For digoxin and Rosuvastatin calcium group：Day1 and Day22；For metformin hydrochloride group：Day1 and Day19

primary_outcome.measure: Summary of Pharmacokinetic parameters Area Under the Plasma Concentration-time Curve form 0 to any time before the last quantifiable concentration(AUC0-t)for digoxin, Rosuvastatin calcium, metformin hydrochloride
primary_outcome.time_frame: For digoxin and Rosuvastatin calcium group：Day1 and Day22；For metformin hydrochloride group：Day1 and Day19

primary_outcome.measure: Summary of Pharmacokinetic parameters Area Under the Plasma Concentration-time Curve form 0 to infinite time(AUCinf)for digoxin, Rosuvastatin calcium, metformin hydrochloride
primary_outcome.time_frame: For digoxin and Rosuvastatin calcium group：Day1 and Day22；For metformin hydrochloride group：Day1 and Day19

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax of digoxin, Rosuvastatin calcium, metformin hydrochloride
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For digoxin and Rosuvastatin calcium group：Day1 and Day22；For metformin hydrochloride group：Day1 and Day19

secondary_outcome.measure: incidence of adverse events/serious adverse event
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From ICF signing date to approximate 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: safety evaluation based on NCI-CTC AE 5.0

secondary_outcome.measure: T1/2 of digoxin, Rosuvastatin calcium, metformin hydrochloride
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For digoxin and Rosuvastatin calcium group：Day1 and Day22；For metformin hydrochloride group：Day1 and Day19

secondary_outcome.measure: CL/F of digoxin, Rosuvastatin calcium, metformin hydrochloride
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For digoxin and Rosuvastatin calcium group：Day1 and Day22；For metformin hydrochloride group：Day1 and Day19

secondary_outcome.measure: Vz/F of digoxin, Rosuvastatin calcium, metformin hydrochloride
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For digoxin and Rosuvastatin calcium group：Day1 and Day22；For metformin hydrochloride group：Day1 and Day19
